Pick tomorrow’s winners today with the All-New Stock Screener! Whether you are conservative and focused on safety and dividend income or aggressive and crave the action of a volatile stock, we have a screen for you.

Instantly check performance across various time frames and drill down to great stock ideas with Buy, Sell, Hold ratings ranked by overall stock quality.

Premium WatchList Users—some Premium WatchLists have been converted to screens and are available there. Tap Explore Screens or view Featured Screens to look for your favorites.

iPhone X!

iOS 11

Additional bug fixes

Pick tomorrow’s winners today with the All-New Stock Screener! Whether you are conservative and focused on safety and dividend income or aggressive and crave the action of a volatile stock, we have a screen for you.

Instantly check performance across various time frames and drill down to great stock ideas with Buy, Sell, Hold ratings ranked by overall stock quality.

Premium WatchList Users—some Premium WatchLists have been converted to screens and are available there. Tap Explore Screens or view Featured Screens to look for your favorites.

RoboTrader (Available for Desktop Subscribers)
Alerts you on when to buy, what to buy, and when to sell. You may execute these alerts and send the trades directly to your broker with a press of a button!

Bug Fixes

RoboTrader (Available for Desktop Subscribers)
Alerts you on when to buy, what to buy, and when to sell. You may execute these alerts and send the trades directly to your broker with a press of a button!

Bug Fixes
Fix for Stock Analysis reports with special characters.
Fix for Stock Analysis reports with special characters.
Updated RoboTrader with new features and more insight into your trading system performance!
Updated RoboTrader with new features and more insight into your trading system performance!
Fix for Stock Analysis reports for end-of-day regions.
Fix for Stock Analysis reports for end-of-day regions.

Stock Lookup on Market Overview
○ You told us you want it to be easier to analyze a stock, so we're giving you the ability to do it right from the market overview screen!

Enhanced RoboTrader Support
○ Now, if you use VectorVest RoboTrader, you can manage your trading systems without being tied to your desktop. Monitor your position, see your gains, and even manage your positions right in the Stock Advisory App. It makes following a trading plan easier than you could ever imagine.
○ See all of your trading systems, along with their performance
○ See more detailed performance on an individual trading system
○ Review the action items for your trading system, and act on them no matter where you are!
○ Keep an eye on your holdings throughout the day

Stock Lookup on Market Overview
○ You told us you want it to be easier to analyze a stock, so we're giving you the ability to do it right from the market overview screen!

Enhanced RoboTrader Support
○ Now, if you use VectorVest RoboTrader, you can manage your trading systems without being tied to your desktop. Monitor your position, see your gains, and even manage your positions right in the Stock Advisory App. It makes following a trading plan easier than you could ever imagine.
○ See all of your trading systems, along with their performance
○ See more detailed performance on an individual trading system
○ Review the action items for your trading system, and act on them no matter where you are!
○ Keep an eye on your holdings throughout the day

Redesigned stock lists to better highlight and compare your sort selection!

New Portfolios section in the app!
• Track your live or paper portfolio in the Stock Advisory App
• Get VectorVest's analysis of you holdings
• Track the performance of your portfolio
• Paper trade to gain confidence in your trading

New multi-select in any stock list
• Add multiple stocks to a WatchList at the same time
• Add multiple stocks to a Portfolio at the same time
• Test a list of stocks to see how they perform going forward!

NEW Stock Picks Page
• Quickly find great buying opportunities with our new Stock Picks page
• Hot Stocks, Retirement Stocks, and Hot Industries right at your fingertips

Easier to use navigation
• We've updated the navigation on our app to make it even easier to use
• Get Market Overview, WatchLists, Portfolios or Picks with one Tap, from anywhere in the app
• Directly access any section of the app from the More menu

Lookup a stock from any screen
• We've added a new shortcut to Stock Lookup, that's available anywhere in the app

Improved WatchList Creation
• We've made it even simpler to create a WatchList of your stocks by walking you through the process of adding stocks to a WatchList

Now it's easier than ever to manage your portfolio on the go with instant alerts!
* Set unlimited price alerts on any stock
* See all recent alerts in app
* TradeNow order updates

Alerts for Desktop users with add on products can receive:
* Portfolio Genius trades
* RoboTrader order and recommendation updates
* WatchDog alerts
